company_overview: Geektheory is an IT services and digital marketing company based in Chennai, India. Founded in 2019, they offer a wide range of technology services including web development, software development, mobile app development, ecommerce solutions, and digital marketing.
key_value_propositions: Full-service technology partner offering end-to-end solutions
Expertise across multiple domains including web, mobile, ecommerce and digital marketing
Young and experienced team capable of handling projects from startups to Fortune 500 companies
Transparent process with no hidden costs
target_customers: Companies looking for web and mobile app development
problems_they_solve: Need for custom web and mobile application development
Digital marketing and online presence optimization
Software development across various frameworks and technologies
IT infrastructure and solutions for businesses of all sizes
unique_differentiators: Diverse expertise across multiple technology domains
Ability to work with both startups and large enterprises
Young, innovative team combined with industry experience
Focus on timely delivery and ongoing support
summary: Geektheory is a versatile IT services and digital marketing company that offers comprehensive technology solutions for businesses of all sizes. Their key strengths lie in their diverse expertise across web development, mobile apps, ecommerce, and digital marketing, coupled with a young, innovative team capable of handling projects for both startups and large enterprises. With a commitment to transparency, timely delivery, and ongoing support, Geektheory positions itself as a reliable technology partner for companies looking to enhance their digital presence and capabilities.
name: Geektheory
description:
Geek Theory is a Chennai Based IT service provider and digital marketing company found in 2019 by Sunthar Gs . Pillared by a team of 30+ enthusiastic people working to transform your ideas into business in the digital world. 

Geek Theory covers almost all IT domains, including web development, web designing, social media marketing, search engine optimization, email marketing, and industrial software. With over 100+ clients ranging from small to large scale industries, we always aim for excellence at a considerably low cost. 

Driven by youngsters and flair for innovation, our journey is always about success.

Digital Marketing Company Hire Our Talent Welcome To GEEKTHEORY Welcome To GEEKTHEORY Best Software Development Company Hire Our Talent Leading Enterprise Application M-commerce and Mobile Development company Hire Our Talent
MINIMALIST AND MASTERFUL WEB DESIGN
SIMPLER YET HIGH QUALITY PROCESS OF
IT DEVELOPMENT
STEP 01
REQUIREMENT GATHERING
Our initial phase of web development involves acknowledging client needs and collecting as much of information in accordance with their business goals
STEP 02
PLANNING
Accordingly we prepare process for implementing and delivering web design services focused on clients specifications and business goals
STEP 03
DESIGN
A wireframe is built from the outline figured After all the information is collected and we agree on the strategies to be executed we let the artistic ideas flow We come up with ideas that complement your company and showcase your brand
STEP 04
DEVELOPMENT
From the design finalized a prototype is built and awaits for approval Once that prototype gets approved development phase begins This is a critical post-web design step in which we are designing everything that is designed and planned for the final implementation process It is indeed a time-consuming process in which web pages are created through codes data and images
STEP 05
TESTING
We perform a comprehensive testing of the entire website at this level of web design services to make sure it runs steadily with no bugs or delays
STEP 06
DELIVERY AND MAINTENANCE
Once testing of website is done there comes the final stage of delivering the carefully crafted art of web design in the hands of clients We make sure a well designed and seamless website is delivered according to customer standards Further in future if client prefers frequent changes in the website we also provide maintenance that will keep your websites updated on a regular basis

ABOUT US
WELCOME TO GEEKTHEORY!
GeekTheory an IT service provider and digital marketing consultant with diversified roots across various domains of technologies that drive the world Specialized in the heterogeneity of technology including web development web designing social media marketing search engine optimization email marketing and industrial software Geek Theory is a staunch advocate of creating a paperless environmentally responsible society
View More
ADVANTAGES
CHECK OUT THE RATINGS FOR IMPORTANT PARAMETERS FOR A STATIC WEBSITE
High performance
Easily manageable
Easiness of adding more pages
New functionality development
SEO management
Value for website
Upgrade
Time-saving
The major benefit of a static website is that it is fast to develop
Highly secured
As there is no server-side back-end processing there will be less surface area to attack and no database is accessible to breach
Cost efficient
It is cheaper to develop than the dynamic websites They are appropriate for companies run over a minimal budget
Inexpensive hosting
Further these static websites can easily acquire dedicated servers at a reasonable price with less efforts
Fast transfer
The transfer process from server to client are easy and quick for the static websites They take relatively less processing time than that of the dynamic websites because of its simple structure
